component.name: File Upload
component.description: A versatile file upload component that handles single and multiple file uploads with drag-and-drop support, file type validation, and progress tracking. Includes file preview thumbnails, upload cancellation, and comprehensive error handling for robust file management.

variants.name: Default
variants.description: A practical implementation of the file upload component with clear visual feedback, intuitive drag-and-drop zones, and helpful validation messages throughout the process. Provides efficient file processing, progress indication, and comprehensive error feedback for users.
